name: Little Herbal Baker
storyline:
As the novice baker Lilia, you will immerse yourself in the warm town of MILKYWOOD. Gather ingredients in wilderness areas, interact with spirits, and hone your baking skills. Don't forget to open your bakery, and befriend the charming townsfolk! Everything is cozy & relaxing.

Little Herbal Baker is created by a single person. In this world, the townsfolk have their own little stories, and you can explore at your own pace with ease. May this game bring some healing to you, as that was my intention in making it, and I really hope you enjoy this game that I made with love.
summary: Little Herbal Baker is a cozy and laid-back game where you play as Lilia, a novice baker who has freshly arrived in a town called ‘MILKYWOOD’ in the fantastical world. Taking over a bakery formerly managed by a master baker, you are now embarking on your journey to become a master baker.
